name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ ネェネ＆ニィニ
summary:
双子の捨てネコ。臆病な姉と、
人懐っこい妹の二匹は、
どうやら里親を探しているみたいだ。　
--
Try not to upset the mood and enjoy　your fun with them.
They are Abandoned twin cats, one is timid and the other one is friendly. They come to find somebody who they can rely on. Try not to upset the mood and enjoy　your fun with them.

When you tap her, she swings and you will
hear sweet and sarrow chirping.
Whatever you would like to do by using Hand!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
info:
